title: february 3: the beginning of illinois
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Illinois becoming a territory, and the history of the state itself. Then she talks about the beginnings of artists starting their own music labels. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
